text: The State symbols of the Independent of Republic of Trinidad and Tobago are the symbols that are used to represent both the divided Trinbagonian people proper and abroad to represent the country and its people. ==Trinbagonian symbols== Symbol Image Coat of arms Coat of arms of Trinidad and Tobago Flag Flag of Trinidad and Tobago Flower National flower of Trinidad and Tobago Warszewiczia coccinea Tree National tree of Trinidad and Tobago Pimenta racemosa Birds National bird of Trinidad and Tobago Ortalis ruficauda Trinbagonian national bird Eudocimus ruber Animal National animal of Trinidad and Tobago Cuniculus paca Reptiles National reptile of Trinidad and Tobago Corallus ruschenbergerii Trinbagonian national reptile Phrynonax poecilonotus Amphibian National amphibian of Trinidad and Tobago Boana punctata Fruit National fruit of Trinidad and Tobago Attalea maripa Dish National dish of Trinidad and Tobago Callaloo Drink National drink of Trinidad and Tobago Swizzle Dance National dance of Trinidad and Tobago Bélé Instrument National instrument of Trinidad and Tobago Steelpan ===Related pages=== * National symbols of Jamaica * National symbols of the West Indies Federation * National symbols of Venezuela
title: National symbols of Trinidad and Tobago
